1. noch nicht das 21. Lebensjahr vollend: 1. has not reached 21 years of age, is not employed and is registered as a job-seeker at an National Employment Agency (Agentur für Arbeit) or
2. noch nicht das 25. Lebensjahr vollend: 2. has not reached 25 years of age and
Anschrift, wenn abweichend vom Antragste: Address, if different from the applicant's address (street/place, street number, postcode, city)
Address (street/place, street number, postcode, city) if different from applicant's address
Anzahl der beigefügten \"Anlage Kind\": Number of attached forms for each child (Anlage Kind)
Ausführliche Informationen zum Kindergel: You can find detailed information about child benefit online at
Beachten Sie bitte die anhängenden Hinwe: Please pay attention to the attached information and the Child Benefit Fact Sheet (Merkblatt Kindergeld)
Bei welcher Familienkasse (Kindergeldnum: At which Family Benefits Office - (child benefit no., staff no.)?
Bitte beachten Sie, dass Ihr Antrag nur: Please note that your application can only be processed if fully completed.
Bitte fügen Sie für jedes Kind, für das: Please attach one "Anlage Kind" form for each child for which you want to claim child benefit.
Bitte füllen Sie die „Anlage Kind“ volls: Please fully complete the form "Anlage Kind". For a first application for child benefit after birth, you will have to enclose the original "Geburtsbescheinigung für Kindergeld" (birth certificate for child benefit). For a child born abroad, the birth certificate is sufficient proof. For children over the age of 18, you must only complete "Anlage Kind", if the child fulfils one of the special requirements stated in the Child Benefit Fact Sheet.
Bitte weisen Sie die wöchentliche Arbeit: Please substantiate the weekly working hours with appropriate documents (e.g. employment contract/certificate of employment from your employer). Deviations from the contractual working hours can be substantiated by payslips, a statement from the worktime account or an employer statement. Absences due to vacation, sickness, etc. do not reduce the contractual working hours.
Der Bescheid soll nicht mir, sondern fol: Do not send the notification to me, but to the following person:
Die Berücksichtigung eines volljährigen: It is possible to consider a child of legal age, if it
Die Berücksichtigung eines über 18 Jahre: It is not possible to consider a child above the age of 18 for child benefit payments, if the child has income of more than EUR 8,004, which is intended or suitable as means of subsistence or for its job training. For this reason a Statement of Income (Erklärung zu den Einkünften und Bezügen) and, if applicable, the Statement of Work-Related Tax Deductions (Erklärung zu den Werbungskosten) must be included in the application for child benefit for a child of legal age.
Die Eintragung der hier abgefragten Anga: This information is mandatory. If the other parent/both parents of the child is/are deceased, add "deceased" (verstorben) to the name. If paternity for a child has not been legally determined, add "unknown" (unbekannt) or "paternity not determined" (Vaterschaft nicht festgestellt).
Die Fragen 6b bzw. 6c sind auch dann mit: Questions 6b or 6c has to be answered with "yes", even if you, your spouse / life partner or another person in a parent/child relationship with one of the children, is working or has been working for diplomatic or consular services.
Ein Kind ist erwerbstätig, wenn es einer: It is assumed that a child is working, if it pursues an occupation aimed at generating income, which requires its personal manpower. So "occupation" can mean dependent employment, agricultural and forestry activities, an own business or self-employment. In comparison, managing your own assets is not considered an occupation.
Entsprechende Nachweise (z.B. über die S: Relevant supporting documents (e.g. for school or vocational training) must be attached.
Folgende Zählkinder sollen berücksichtig: The following counted children (Zählkinder) must be considered:
Füllen Sie bitte den Antragsvordruck und: Please complete the application form as well as the Annex "Child" (Anlage Kind) legibly and check where applicable. Do not forget your signature! If you are under age, a legal representative has to sign for you.
Für folgende Kinder beziehe ich bereits: I already receive child benefit for the following children:
Geben Sie bitte das Konto an, auf welche: Please specify the payment account for child benefit. The IBAN (international bank account number) and the BIC (internationl bank identifier code) replace the previous national account details and can be seen on your bank statement.
Hier sind beispielsweise Ansprüche auf F: Here you have to fill in, for example, family benefit claims for children in other states, or child-related benefits from an public-sector employer (e.g. the European Union).
Hierzu zählt auch die bei einem privaten: This also includes the activities for a private employer, if public-sector employees were put on leave for this. State-recognized religious communities (churches including religious orders, church hospitals, schools, kindergarten, etc.) as well as independent welfare organizations and associated bodies, are not considered part of the public service.
Hinweis nach dem Bundesdatenschutzgesetz: Information according to the German Data Protection Act: The data is collected, processed and used due to and for the purpose of §§ 31, 62 to 78 of the Income Tax Act (Einkommenssteuergesetz) and the Tax Code (Abgabenordnung) and the Federal Child Benefit Act (Bundeskindergeldgesetz) and the Social Security Code (Sozialgesetzbuch).
Hinweise zum Antrag auf Kindergeld und z: Information for the application for child benefit and for "Anlage KInd"
Ich bin damit einverstanden, dass dem An: I agree that the child benefit will be paid to the applicant.
Ich versichere, dass ich alle Angaben (a: I hereby declare that all the information was provided truthfully (in the annexes as well). I am aware that any change in the given information has to be reported to the responsible Family Benefits Office immediately. I received the Child Benefit Fact Sheet and took notice of its content.
Ist Ihr Kind behindert, füllen Sie bitte: If your child is disabled, please fill in the form "Annex for handicapped child of legal age" (Anlage für das volljährige behinderte Kind). For adopted/accepted children, please also attach the family court's notice of acceptance.
Kinder, für die eine andere Person Kinde: Children for whom another person receives child benefit might increase your child benefit (counted children (Zählkinder)). If you want to claim consideration of counted children, please provide information who receives the child benefit for the counted children from which child Family Benefits Office.
Lassen Sie den Antrag auch von dem mit I: Have your spouse / life partner / the other parent sign the application as well, if he/she agrees to your receiving the child benefit. If there is no consensus, please inform the Family Benefits Office about it. If the beneficiary was determined in court, please submit the court decision.
Laut beigefügter/n „Anlage(n) Kind“. Für: According to the attached form "Anlage Kind". You must submit a fully completed, separate "Anlage Kind" for each child, for which you claim child benefit for the first time.
Nach Abschluss einer erstmaligen Berufsa: After completing the first apprenticeship or university degree, a child in the cases of Number 2 (a to d) is only considered, if the child does not pursue a (detrimental) employment. An education (apprenticeship or university degree) is completed, if it provides the qualification to pursue a profession, even if advanced training might be required. This also applies, if the degree does not yet qualify for the the aspired career (e.g. sales clerk, paramedic, teachers or lawyers after passing their first state examination).
Name: Surname
Nur von der Familienkasse auszufüllen: To be completed by the Family Benefits Office
Sofern Sie nicht die deutsche Staatsange: If you are not a citizen of Germany, a state of the EU/EEA or Switzerland, please attach proof of your residence title (e.g. passport copy).
Staatsangehörigkeit (bei nicht EU-/EWR-S: Nationality (in case of nationality outside of EU or EEA, please provide record of residence title)
Unterschrift des Antragstellers / der An: Signature of the applicant or legal representative
Unterschrift des gemeinsam mit dem Antra: Signature of the spouse / life parter / other parent (or his/her legal representative) living in the same household as the applicant.
Vorname des Kindes ggf. abweichender Fam: First name of the child and alternative surname, if applicable
Wenn Kinder außerhalb Ihres Haushalts le: If children live outside your household, state the reason (e.g. staying with grandparents / at a foster home / at student or apprentice dormitory)
Wenn beide Elternteile eines Kindes die: If both parents of a child qualify for child benefit, the parent agreed upon by both parents should be named as applicant. You should only tick "permanently separated" under "Family status", if at least one spouse intends to stay separated constantly. If you are not married, or your spouse/life partner is not the biological parent of at least one of the children listed in the attached form(s) "Anlage Kind", please enter the information for the other biological parent (or for both biological parents in case of foster children or grandchildren) in the relevant "Anlage Kind".
Wer bezieht das Kindergeld (Name, Vornam: Who receives the child benefit (surname, first name)?
Zu 1 und 2: Angaben zur antragstellenden: For 1 and 2: Information on the applicant and the spouse / life partner
Zu 2: Kindschaftsverhältnis zur antragst: For 2: Relationship of child to applicant, to spouse / life partner and other persons
Zu 3: Angaben für ein volljähriges Kind: For 3: Information for a child of legal age
Zu 3: Angaben zum Zahlungsweg: For 3: Information on the payment method
Zu 5: Anspruch auf eine Geldleistung von: For 5: Claim to cash benefit from a body outside Germany / from international or supranational body
Zu 6: Folgende Zählkinder sollen berücks: For 6: The following counted children (Zählkinder) are to be considered
Zu 6: Sind oder waren Sie oder eine ande: For 6: Does one of the following apply to you or another person in a parent/child relationship with the child in the last five years prior to application (...)
b) sich in einer Übergangszeit von höchs: b) undergoing a transition period of no more than 4 months, or
c) eine Berufsausbildung mangels Ausbild: c) cannot begin or continue vocational training due to lack of an apprenticeship position, or
d) einen geregelten Freiwilligendienst l: d) performing regulated voluntary service, or
ggf. Geburtsname und Name aus früherer E: birth name and name from previous marriage, if applicable
telefonische Rückfrage tagsüber unter Nr: Daytime phone number in case of questions:
wegen körperlicher, geistiger oder seeli: is not able to support itself due to a physical, mental, or phsychological disability; to qualify, the handicap must have occured before the child reached 25 years of age (without age limit).
„Andere Personen“, zu denen ein Kindscha: "Other persons" to whom the child has a parent/child relationship are: parents, step parents, adoptive parents, foster parents, grandparents.
„Tätigkeit im öffentlichen Dienst“ bedeu: "Public-sector employment" means an occupation as a civil servant / pension recipient / federal, state or municipal employee subject to collective agreements, or employee of another public-sector institution, corporation or foundation, or as a judge, professional soldier, or regular soldier.
